title: Player.1
body: This has to be the mafia's hideout! If I can get past his goons and reach the boss, I can finally end his reign of terror over the city! [[Answer:Player.2|Player.2]]

title: Player.2
body: Looks like there's someone guarding that door there. If I gun him down now though, it'll trip the alarm. Guess I'll have to bluff my way past them. [[Answer:Player.3|Player.3]]

title: Player.4
body: I need to see your boss. I have urgent business with him. [[Answer:Player.5|Player.5]]

title: Player.5
body: An urgent matter, eh? The boss didn't say nothin' about any urgent appointments today. Besides, no one's getting in without showing their ID. Now scram! [[Answer:Player.6.1|Player.6.1]] [[Answer:Player.6.2|Player.6.2]]

title: Player.6.1
body: How about this? You let me in, and I'll pay you a nice, hefty sum. But you gotta keep it between us. [[Answer:Player.7.1|Player.7.1]]

title: Player.6.2
body: Well, I guess I'll have no choice but to take you out then! [[Answer:Player.7.2|Player.7.2]]

title: Player.7.1
body: Now you're bribin' me? [i]sigh[/i] Well, I suppose I could take it. How much you payin'? [[Answer:Player.8|Player.8]]

title: Player.9
body: [i]One thousand grand?![/i] Man, you [i]really[/i] want in, don't you? Well, I guess we agreed to a deal. Head on in.
